benefits.name: Water filter reimbursement
benefits.description: Get reimbursed for NSF-certified filters when medically necessary.

benefits.name: Home water testing
benefits.description: Covers up to two certified lab tests per year when contaminants exceed guidelines.
benefits.requirements: Provide EWG or utility exceedance report

benefits.name: Leak detection service
benefits.description: Annual leak inspection including smart meter check and pipe survey.
